short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use TopTab Search as a default search engine

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TopTab Search enhances your browsing experience by providing a more functional and efficient custom search engine. Search results and advertisements are delivered by trusted partners, ensuring a secure and seamless experience through HTTP redirects.

By clicking "Add to Chrome" you agree to install the "TopTab Search" extension, set it as your default search engine in Chrome, and accept the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

For further information, please visit:
- Privacy Policy: https://toptabapp.com/links/privacy.html
- Terms of Use: https://toptabapp.com/links/terms.html
- About: https://toptabapp.com/links/about.html
- Contact: https://toptabapp.com/links/contact.html
